item.title: Learning IoT: First Steps with Elixir
item.description: Recently I have the opportunity to give a conference in the Startup Week in Mexico City. So I decided talk about Internet of things, because I was learning this using an Arduino and a Raspberry Pi. DEMO Connect Everything! The project is create a simple web application for create distribuid music. I was inspired in the Launchpad App and the Smartphone Symphony. I planned make this using Phoenix Framework, and connect an Arduino for play the music.
